snippet: General Electric stock rose after the company reported earnings that were better than analysts were expecting.
abstract: Stocks rise modestly, handing market its third straight week of gains.
lead_paragraph: General Electric stock rose after the company reported earnings that were better than analysts were expecting.

headline.main: Wall St. Nudges Upward After Solid Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: Third Week of Gains, With a Focus on Earnings
